trans-unit.source: Create Advanced Encoding Workflows with Workflow Designer
trans-unit.target: Create Advanced Encoding Workflows with Workflow Designer

trans-unit.source: Learn about how to create advanced encoding workflows with Workflow Designer.
trans-unit.target: Learn about how to create advanced encoding workflows with Workflow Designer.

trans-unit.source: Create Advanced Encoding Workflows with Workflow Designer
trans-unit.target: Create Advanced Encoding Workflows with Workflow Designer

trans-unit.source: The **Workflow Designer** is a standalone tool that is used to create workflows/graphs for encoding with **Media Encoder Premium Workflow**.
trans-unit.target: The **Workflow Designer** is a standalone tool that is used to create workflows/graphs for encoding with **Media Encoder Premium Workflow**.

trans-unit.source: This tool can also be used to modify [existing workflows](media-services-workflow-designer.md#existing_workflows).
trans-unit.target: This tool can also be used to modify [existing workflows](media-services-workflow-designer.md#existing_workflows).

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE]To get a copy of the Workflow Designer tool, please contact mepd@microsoft.com.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE]To get a copy of the Workflow Designer tool, please contact mepd@microsoft.com.

trans-unit.source: Once a workflow file is created, it can be uploaded as an Asset, and then be used for encoding media files.
trans-unit.target: Once a workflow file is created, it can be uploaded as an Asset, and then be used for encoding media files.

trans-unit.source: For information on how to encode with **Media Encoder Premium Workflow** using **.NET**, see [Advanced encoding with Media Encoder Premium Workflow](media-services-encode-with-premium-workflow.md).
trans-unit.target: For information on how to encode with **Media Encoder Premium Workflow** using **.NET**, see [Advanced encoding with Media Encoder Premium Workflow](media-services-encode-with-premium-workflow.md).

trans-unit.source: The default workflow files can be modified using the designer tool.
trans-unit.target: The default workflow files can be modified using the designer tool.

trans-unit.source: You can get the default workflow files [here](https://github.com/Azure/azure-media-services-samples/tree/master/Encoding%20Presets/VoD/MediaEncoderPremiumWorkfows).
trans-unit.target: You can get the default workflow files [here](https://github.com/Azure/azure-media-services-samples/tree/master/Encoding%20Presets/VoD/MediaEncoderPremiumWorkfows).

trans-unit.source: The folder also contains the description of these files.
trans-unit.target: The folder also contains the description of these files.

trans-unit.source: The following videos demonstrate how to use the designer.
trans-unit.target: The following videos demonstrate how to use the designer.

trans-unit.source: Creating multiple output MP4 files for use with Azure Media Services streaming
trans-unit.target: Creating multiple output MP4 files for use with Azure Media Services streaming

trans-unit.source: Varying Source file scenarios – handling audio
trans-unit.target: Varying Source file scenarios – handling audio
